author: Mike Thomas
text: It’s my Twitterversary four years ago today. Hope everyone is having a great weekend.

author: Mike Thomas
text: My son just got out of surgery; everything went well. Thank you all for your positive thoughts.  It is greatly appreciated.

author: Mike Thomas
text: Just dropped my son off at the hospital. Longest five or six hours of my life. 🙏🏻

author: Mike Thomas
text: My son is scheduled to have back surgery tomorrow morning; I would greatly appreciate any kind thoughts. I know he is in excellent hands but still so nervous...
